TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of study in which both the health providers and the patients are aware of the drug or treatment being given.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "open label study"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "estudio sin anonimato"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de estudio en el que tanto los proveedores de la salud como los pacientes conocen el medicamento o el tratamiento que se administra.
